description:
Keroro hatches a plan to convert Natsumi`s anger into energy for the invasion... or is it just an excuse for him to slack off? Then, a misunderstanding over the expression "dessert stomach" leads the platoon to take desperate measures to get their own version of this "secret weapon."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, One Week Without Anger / Keroro, Invasion is a Second Stomach?
夏美 怒ってはいけない一週間 であります / ケロロ 侵略はベツバラ? であります
